name: Pluto vs. the Worlds
description:
Long ago, Pluto was exiled from his family - losing the status and respect that a planet commands. Isolated for ages, all that remains of Pluto is his sadness and anger. Now, the time has come for the dwarf planet to take revenge upon the siblings that cast him out.

Fight your way through 6 intense battles in this epic Boss Rush and ensure that Pluto finally has his revenge.

Keyboard Controls:
A/D - left/right
Space - Jump
Ctrl - Dash (attack + dodge)

Gamepad controls:
Left Stick - left/right
Face Buttons - Jump
Bumpers - Dash

Credits:

Gameplay/Art/SFX - Brandon Olive

Logo Design - Hunter Landrum

Additional Voice Acting - Chris Helms

Music - YouTube Audio Library

Known Issues:

- Settings don't work after returning to Title :/ if you want  to change them after  playing the game, you have to restart it

-Only 6 bosses. I wanted 9 but ran out of time :,(

-Pausing the game only slightly works

-Menus can be a little weird sometimes

-Sound effects are *pretty bad* but are also kind of hilarious

-Retrying on the final boss is broken, but it's in the player's favor and it's 2 AM so I'll allow it
